TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TimerExtension extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Abstract base class for timer extensions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A timer extension is used by activities such as <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Delay> to manage timers.
